analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/45/0x50c01f0eb2838899c2995aa823388a5259c48aa1.sol:
	Contract Puremail has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/45/0x50c01f0eb2838899c2995aa823388a5259c48aa1.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/45/0x50c01f0eb2838899c2995aa823388a5259c48aa1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/45/0x50c01f0eb2838899c2995aa823388a5259c48aa1.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/45/0x50c01f0eb2838899c2995aa823388a5259c48aa1.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
